QuestData.Title: Cutting the Swarm
QuestData.Description: The mantid numbers have been increasing since you left for the cleft. Let's put these orbs you gathered to use.$B$BGet down on the battlefront and man one of the cannons. Let none through.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use a Dragon Launcher to kill 50 swarming mantid.
QuestData.CompletionText: I can't remember the last time they swarmed this thickly. They probably haven't within my lifetime.
